snippet.title: Klondike Solitaire for Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Klondike is a game about cards, fun and relax. Take Nintendo Switch, use joycons or play in handheld mode and unlock new backgrounds, cards and music tracks. 

Our intention was made the game with the unique and elegant look. We offer two different scoring modes, various types of content and two cameras. Play it, win in it, and aim for a new high-score! 
Game release: 1st March, 2019.
